Title: Chairman Mao Quotation
Designer: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Publisher: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Notes: The Mao quotation reads:"The people of the world must unite to oppose any war of aggression caused by imperialism or social imperialism, and in particular to oppose a war of aggression that makes use of nuclear weapons! If such a war starts, the people of the world must counter this aggressive war with a revolutionary war, and must start to prepare for it today!"Nr. 2 of the set 'Posters showing measures against atomic, chemical and bacterial warfare' (1971).
